availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Lucinda Long Tomlinson in Scott County on December 25, 1839. Father of Amanda Tomlinson, Orlando Tomlinson, Charles H. Tomlinson, John Tomlinson, Cordelia Tomlinson, Margaret Tomlinson, George Ann Tomlinson, Sarah C. Tomlinson, Keene Thomas Tomlinson, and Washington Tomlinson. Farmer in Fayette County in 1850. Farmer in Franklin County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, District 1, p. 118B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 1, p. 180.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Scott County Marriages, 1803-1883, Film #000183225, p. 145 of 331 of microfilm.
